name: Rex Rocket
blurb: Join us in a retro sci-fi adventure!  Battle your way through slime and angry robots in a desperate attempt to save ship and crew!

rewards.reward:
SPACE CADET
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Every space buck counts and you have our eternal gratitude for your donation.
—————————————————
Get your name in the game on the Kickstarter Datatbase Computer.
—————————————————
A Kickstarter exclusive wallpaper!

COSMIC CORPORAL
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
On release, you'll be able to download a DRM-free copy of the game for PC.
—————————————————
In addition to the game, you'll be given access to post comments and ideas on our intergalactic forum!  Think a certain variation of an enemy looks more appealing?  Help us shape Rex Rocket into its final form. (includes previous rewards)

SONIC ENGINEER\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nTake the beats of Rex Rocket with you anywhere you go with this digital download of the OST from chiptune artist Saskrotch. (includes previous rewards)

MOON SERGEANT
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
COME AND GET IT!!  EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!!!
Become a closed Beta Tester! Be a part of the process to make Rex Rocket and provide us with feedback more valuable than a Spectra Diamond! 
—————————————————
 A digital remix album of the OST! Just remember to stop high-fiving yourself long enough to gloat to your friends about having this. 
—————————————————
Enjoy your name as it scrolls up the screen during the ending credits! —————————————————
Special edition digital instruction manual.
(includes previous rewards)

ASTRO LIEUTENANT
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Become a closed Beta Tester! Be a part of the process to make Rex Rocket and provide us with feedback more valuable than a Spectra Diamond!
—————————————————
A digital remix album of the OST! Just remember to stop high-fiving yourself long enough to gloat to your friends about having this.
—————————————————
Enjoy your name as it scrolls up the screen during the ending credits!
—————————————————
Special edition digital instruction manual. (includes previous non-limited rewards)

HONORARY SPACE ROBOT\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nWe'll name a HelperB0T after you!    The S.S. Montana is filled with HelperB0Ts and HelperB0Ts need names!  Send us your best HelperB0T name (keep it SFW people). (includes previous  non-limited rewards)

NOVA MAJOR
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Get the Kickstarter exclusive Light Revolver.   A gun so powerful it can blast a hole clear through a star! 
—————————————————
A limited Kickstarter outfit for Rex that does nothing, but hey, you'll look cool!!!  (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

ATOMIC COLONEL
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Digital Concept Art Book. Check out EVERYTHING ever created by Rob in the development of Rex Rocket. Concept art, descriptions, mock scenes, sketches, and animations await.
—————————————————
Join the mission and participate in live streams of the game being developed on our computers.   Listen in while Rob & Tyler discuss everything from level mechanics  (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

CHIEF SCIENTIST\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nYou cheaters gotta pay for it! Get a digital HD copy of the entire ship layout. Each room on the ship will be pieced together with highlights of secret areas, special items, and extra lives contained throughout the S.S. Montana.    (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

PLANETARY GENERAL\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nGet a limited edition Rex Rocket t-shirt.  Comes in S/M/L/XL!   Ships to US & Canada only!  (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

STAR COMMANDER\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nGet a signed hard copy of the game by Rob and Tyler!!!  Ships to US & Canada only! (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

GALACTIC EMPEROR\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nParticipate in a 1 to 1 Google+ Hangout to design a level object with Rob and Tyler! This object can be anything from a new robot enemy to a sneaky level hazard!  (includes all previous non-limited rewards)

UNIVERSAL OVERLORD\r\n\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\r\nJoin the four billion mile high club and create your own NPC for Rex Rocket!   Send us your picture and idea for your character.  As long as the name and dialog fit with the world of Rex Rocket, Rob will bring your character to life!   (includes all previous non-limited rewards)
